content: so that ws is facing you work the heel flap over the next 35 41 heel sts the heel flap is worked flat in row the remaining 37 43 instep sts are put on hold adjust your needles/markers accordingly row 1 ws k1 p33 39 k1 turn row 2 rs *k1 sl1 * repeat from * to * until 1 st remains k1 turn repeat these two row 19 21 more times for a total of 40 44 row or until desired length i walk the line v1 0 - shuyi wu - 3 heel turn the heel turn begins on a ws row only mc is used row 1 ws sl1 p19 21 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 k6 4 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 p until 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 k until 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3-4 until all stitches have been consumed 21 23 stitches remain do not turn after the final rs row gusset setup with mc pick up and knit 20 22 sts along the side of the heel flap or 1 st for every 2 heel flap row to pick up along a garter edge slide your left needle through all the purl bumps on the edge and knit them the bor is here at the beginning of the instep knit 0 3 sts work the next 36 instep sts according to row 3 of the chart and knit 1 4 sts optional tip on the first instep row after the heel i like to pick up an extra loop from each corner between the heel flap and the instep and knit it together with the first or last instep stitch to eliminate gaps pick up and knit 20 22 sts along the other side of the heel flap or the same number as the first side knit to bor at this point you should have 43 49 instep sts including the 6 yo/byo s and 20+21+20 = 61 22+23+22 = 67 gusset/sole sts your stitch count will differ if you picked up a different number of gusset stitches - this is fine foot round 1 decrease round knit 0 3 sts work the next 36 instep sts as established according to the next row of the chart and knit 1 4 sts k1 ssk k until 3 sts before bor k2tog k1 round 2 knit 0 3 sts work the next 36 instep sts as established according to the next row of the chart and knit 1 4 sts k to bor repeat rounds 1-2 until 31 37 sole sts remain for a total of 68 80 sts this is intentionally smaller than the stitch count you started with continue to work the instep as established and knit all sole sts until the foot is - 1 75 2 inches - 4 25 4 75 cm or i walk the line v1 0 - shuyi wu -
